porfolio.title: Web Development and Digital Marketing Portfolio

abstrac: Eternus Global aims to be globally competitive, to provide high-quality information technology, web development, software and application development, and KPO services.
bio:
Based in Iloilo City, Philippines, our IT outsourcing team consists of 20 developers, designers, digital marketers, writers and data entry workers. 
Our area of expertise is Ecommerce development using Magento, Prestashop, and Woocommerce. 
We also offer the following services:
-Responsive Web development (Wordpress, Drupal, PHP) 
-Ecommerce development (Woocommerce, Prestashop)
-Web app and software development
-Custom theme and plugin development and integration also
-Mobile app development
-Digital Marketing (SEO, keyword research, keyword analysis, SERP analysis, Google analytics, Google search console, local business listings, directory submission, email marketing, content strategy, Pay Per Click (PPC) advertising), graphics design
- Writing and Research (content writing, technical writing, academic writing, pharmaceutical writing)
How do we work with clients? We usually accomplish these steps:
FIRST STEP: CONSULTATION
- A brief session with our strategists to discuss your current situation and to get authentic advice for website strategy. This may be through Skype call/meeting wherever you are (in your home, office, in a restaurant or even at the beach!) or in-person meeting in your office or our sales offices
- This is scheduled within 2-4 days from inquiry
SECOND STEP: PLANNING
- A discussion of insights after brainstorming of strategists
- A review and planning session of possible strategies
- Website functionality, analytics and/or campaign review
- Review of competitors
- Written report containing summary of findings 
- Scheduled after a week from consultation

THIRD STEP: Execution
-Start of contract up to deployment
We usually answer to inquiries within a few minutes up to 8 hours. To talk to our Happiness Engineer, add us in skype: eternusglobalcs or log in to our website here: http://www.eternusglobal.com/

Skype: eternusglobalcs
Available on WhatsApp 24/7
Available 24/7 through chatbot at www.eternusglobal.com

abstrac: Expert Fullstack Web Developer with PHP, CodeIgniter, MySQL experience
bio:
I am an expert FullStack Developer having experience in developing websites, eCommerce, SAAS Applications, database design.  I am skilled at Agile Project Management, Consulting, and steering my clients to choose the right technologies.

Domains Experience:-
✅ eCommerce: Marketplace and Sass applications For Service & Product Selling
✅ E-learning Systems
✅ Clothing & Accessories
✅ Affiliate Marketing
✅ Automotive & Car accessories
✅ ERP
✅ Health care & Pharmaceuticals
✅ Real Estate & Property Listing Websites... any many more..........

Core Technical Experience
✅ PHP frameworks: CodeIgnitor, CakePHP, Laravel
✅ CMS packages: WordPress
✅ Database: MySQL, MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
✅ Front End Development: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript, PSD to HTML, Material Design, Adobe illustrator
✅ Project Management: Asana, Trello, Basecamp, JIRA

Teamwork
✅Scrum, Kanban, XP experience
✅Github, Gitlab, Bitbucket, SVN

Hosting & Server Administration
✅ Linux, Windows, Ubuntu
✅ Custom or Third-party Software/packages installation

API experience includes:
✅ Google APIs, QuickBooks API, Bokun API, SalesForce API, Google Adwords and Google Map API, Rapnet API, Clickatell API, Twilio

Project Management Skills:
✅ Process (P): Initiation, Planning, Execution, Monitoring & Control and Closure
✅ Aptitude (A): Triple Constraints (Time, Scope, Cost), Quality, Communication, Risk, Stakeholders, and Delivery
✅ Leverage (L): Agile working way, Teamwork, Quality deliveries, and Proactive communications.

I have extensive experience using ASANA, Basecamp, Trello, MS Project, and comfortable using a communication channel.  I always make sure to keep you updated about all phases of development so you can reach out for help or questions anytime.

I would be excited to consult and assist you in choosing the right solution for your Businesses.

Please feel free to connect anytime.

Simona held a variety of positions in  the business sector for over 20 years such as customer service, retail sales, telemarketing sales and research just to name a few. abstrac: Certified Digital Marketer (SEO, SEM & SMM) | Certified WordPress Developer | DB Expert | Oracle Developer | Virtual Assistant
bio:
I carry a rich experience of 15+ years as a Technologist in diversified industries for instance Finance, Banking, Health Care, Education, Textile, Aviation, IT Consulting etc. I know how to use the power of IT to generate exciting business opportunities and effectively manage them to bring fruitful results. 

My professional background carriers a mix of technical and managerial skills. I am a position holder in Masters Degree and during my professional journey of more than 15 years working for Worlds Top Organizations (to name a few) Emirates Airline, Dnata, Grant Thornton & YB Group, I mastered the norms of the world with respect to business perspective. 

During my Digital Marketing & Web Development professional career I have worked on diversified projects consisting of SEO, Web Development, Blogging, PESO (Paid, Earned, Social and Owned Media) etc. My core competency lies in SEO Audits, WordPress SEO, SEO Keyword Research, SEO Competition Analysis, Creating SEO optimized Web sites and YouTube SEO. My work is my Passion, and my objective is to assist my clients to the best of my knowledge, by staying abreast of updates in Search Engine Algorithms and the Industry, to deliver high ROI. 

I would describe myself as "Someone who has not only been able to meet client's 
expectations but has consistently exceeded them throughout my career pursuing local and international projects". 

Kindly don't consider me as an Expert, I am still a learner and I am intending to learn more and more as a Freelancer. There is so much to learn these days. I am a strong believer of "The day I stopped learning I will be dead". 

Will highly appreciate if we can help each other learning. At least I can learn something form you and vice versa. Please don't hesitate to contact and stay in touch.
  
Thanks for reading my profile.

I currently have flexible hours based on the project and have covered all manner of schedules based on time zones and client needs. I do require milestone structured payments for lengthy single projects, and structured payment schedules agreed to upfront for ongoing work.
